thread.title: The world's most expensive gemstones, in pictures
thread.title_full: The world's most expensive gemstones, in pictures

title: The world's most expensive gemstones, in pictures
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 11 View All Skip Ad 
This diamond named the Pink Star has been described as “one of the world’s great natural treasures” as it is set to sell for a record-breaking £50 million next month. 
The Pink Star is a 59.6-carat oval mixed-cut gem which is the largest Internally Flawless Fancy Vivid Pink diamond that the Gemological Institute of America (GIA) has ever graded. It was was unveiled by Sotheby’s in London today ahead of its sale on April 4 in Hong Kong. 
Here you can see some of the world's most expensive diamonds. Sotheby's
